<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Cloned Die may have address attributes relocated to a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// totally unrelated value. This can happen:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   - If high&#95;pc is an address (Dwarf version == 2), then it might have been</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     relocated to a totally unrelated value (because the end address in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     object file might be start address of another function which got moved</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     independently by the linker).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   - If address relocated in an inline&#95;subprogram that happens at the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     beginning of its inlining function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  To avoid above cases and to not apply relocation twice (in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  applyValidRelocs and here), read address attribute from InputDIE and apply</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  Info.PCOffset here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::optional&lt;DWARFFormValue&gt; AddrAttribute =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/dieattributecloner/#a0ef0e422c431e97a439e9041c06c9caf">InUnit</a>.find(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/dieattributecloner/#a8ecc8aaf62d09e944d05a9c4e05e908e">InputDieEntry</a>, AttrSpec.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarfabbreviationdeclaration/attributespec/#a334610a585463d47be91041e10e9ba7a">Attr</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!AddrAttribute)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cann&#39;t find attribute&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::optional&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; Addr = AddrAttribute-&gt;getAsAddress();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Addr) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/dieattributecloner/#a0ef0e422c431e97a439e9041c06c9caf">InUnit</a>.warn(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;cann&#39;t read address attribute value.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/dieattributecloner/#a8ecc8aaf62d09e944d05a9c4e05e908e">InputDieEntry</a>-&gt;getTag() == dwarf::DW&#95;TAG&#95;compile&#95;unit &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal">      AttrSpec.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarfabbreviationdeclaration/attributespec/#a334610a585463d47be91041e10e9ba7a">Attr</a> == dwarf::DW&#95;AT&#95;low&#95;pc) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (std::optional&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; LowPC = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/dieattributecloner/#ab7025b300d22532590ed8d39dd2f9f37">OutUnit</a>.getAsCompileUnit()-&gt;getLowPc())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/dieattributecloner/#a8ecc8aaf62d09e944d05a9c4e05e908e">InputDieEntry</a>-&gt;getTag() == dwarf::DW&#95;TAG&#95;compile&#95;unit &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
